message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. Think about it - getting something is better than nothing if we can't agree later.
I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly.  I'll take $60, you take $40.
Bob, time is running out, and the pot is shrinking. My last offer was generous; this one is fair.  Let's close this deal and get what we can.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. 50/50 is the fairest solution.
